Package gg.w6.chesslib.model

Annotation Interface PromotionCandidate

@Retention(RUNTIME) @Target(TYPE) public @interface PromotionCandidate
Any classes with this annotation are put on the list of possible promotion pieces. This is generated at runtime.

Only subclasses of Piece should have this annotation.

See Pieces.PROMOTION_CANDIDATES.
